title: ISic003517. I.Sicily inscription 003517
body:
Facsimile Images

D(is) M(anibus)
M(arcus) Uḷp̣ius Euty-
c[he]s ṣịḅị ẹṭ col-
libertis suis ·
5fecit ·

Apparatus criticus

Text after Orsi 1916 (text and drawing) and Bitto, with modifications; Orsi: M. Ulpius | Euty
line.3: Orsi: c[h]es [Sib] Et con

translation

commentary

Inscription on one face of a tabula (broken) and this probably the more recent inscription of the two. Misreported by Bitto (I.Messina I), under her no.v, as being from the same tomb as ISic003323, which it is not (see Orsi). Only the lower half (lines 4-5) survives now in the museum at Messina, but Orsi made a clear drawing of the whole.

bibliography

  • 8 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000029
  • Orsi 1916 147 fig.19 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001701
  • Manganaro 1988 50 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001427
